explanation: The page provides information about the Elektronisches Patientendossier (EPD), a system for storing and managing personal health data.
The page discusses the evaluation of students in Basisstufe and ADL schools and mentions the use of LehrerOffice for generating reports.
The page introduces the Berufsbildungsportal, a service that allows users to manage and view their vocational training data.
The page offers information on online consultations via Microsoft Teams for the Regional Employment Center (RAV) in Appenzell A.Rh.
The page provides comprehensive information on how to file electronic tax returns for the year 2022. It mentions the use of eSteuern-Programm and oBeam App for electronic submissions.
The page lists various digital teaching materials and software such as Antolin, Die Sprachstarken, dis donc!, edulog, Leseschlau, Typewriter, and Young World.
software_name: Antolin, Die Sprachstarken, dis donc!, edulog, Leseschlau, Typewriter, Young World
